verbs.description: More than 60 Democratic representatives [V: are] demanding an ethics investigation into President Trump 's ties to China , following the president 's recent push to rescue Chinese telecommunications firm ZTE .

[ARG0: More than 60 Democratic representatives] are [V: demanding] [ARG1: an ethics investigation into President Trump 's ties to China] , [ARGM-TMP: following the president 's recent push to rescue Chinese telecommunications firm ZTE] .

More than 60 Democratic representatives are demanding an ethics investigation into President Trump 's ties to China , [V: following] [ARG2: the president 's recent push to rescue Chinese telecommunications firm ZTE] .
